sql.name: tssgformsum.shoulidishi
sql.item: select city.c801800001 from {400} city where city.c801800001!='集团' order by city.c801842006

sql.name: tssgformsum.shouliqudao
sql.item: select Way.C801800001 from {500} Way order by Way.C801842006

sql.name: tssgformsum.kehuleixing
sql.item: select usertype.c801800001 from {600} usertype order by usertype.c801842006

sql.name: tssgformsum.qudao
sql.item: select t.C630000018 as name ,t.C630000030 as id from {100} t where t.C630000021='2' and ((t.C630000018 like '%分公司%') or (t.C630000018 like '%区客服%') or (t.C630000018 like '%河北移动%'))
